member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.LibraryRuntime.IIoTCoreRuntime.Start(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: The IP-Address of the global IoTCore instance.
The Port of the global IoTCore instance.

member.name: M:VSEIoTCoreServer.LibraryRuntime.IIoTCoreRuntime.AddMirror(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a running VSEIoTCore to the global IoTCore via Mirroring.
member.param: The IP-Address of the VSEIoTCore that shall be added to the global IoTCore.
The Port of the VSEIoTCore that shall be added to the global IoTCore.
